Class GuiGameObserver

java.lang.Object
studio.devsavegg.gui.GuiGameObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObserver
public class GuiGameObserver extends Object implements IGameObserver
Bridges Game Engine events to the JavaFX UI thread.

Ensures all UI updates occur on the JavaFX Application Thread using Platform.runLater(java.lang.Runnable).

# Principle - Dependency Inversion / Interface Segregation: Decouples the game engine from JavaFX specifics.

    • onHandEnded

      public void onHandEnded(Map<Player,Integer> winnings)
      Displays final hand results and winnings.

      Blocks the game thread using a CountDownLatch until the user dismisses the results overlay.

      # Design - Observer / Synchronization: Reacts to Hand End event and synchronizes threads.

      Specified by:
      onHandEnded in interface IGameObserver
      Parameters:
      winnings - The map of winnings.
